website_summaries.verdict: The perfect glass set for the frozen margarita lover.
pros: The True Fabrication glasses do a wonderful job at keeping frozen margaritas cold and slushy
The addition of the silicone band keeps your hands from getting cold, and is greatly appreciated
There is a thick rim, perfect for salt or sugar
The glasses would also work well as ice cream bowls, given their wide opening and cooling abilities
cons: The silicone band was on the small side, making it awkward to hold

customer_reviews.title: It Makes a Difference....
customer_reviews.text: It makes a Difference. I noticed that it was keeping the drinks cooler. I wasn't sure if it was just me, so I did a test. I used one cup from the freezer and one with no cooling. Surprised at the results. Use my favorite drink a coke with no ice. Took it out of the Refrig and it was 38.3 degrees. Poured equal amounts in both cups. After 1 min. 35.2 and 45.5 degrees. After 5 min's 33.6 and 48.2, After 10 min's 33.0 and 50.3, After 20 min's 33.2 and 54.8, After 30 min's 33.6 and 56.2 degrees. So Confirmed it does what is say's it would. That is all you can ask for.
customer_reviews.author: G. Bee

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one set to try them out. Have made Margaritas several times now and used the cups every time. They keep them nice & frozen :) I had to order another set! Definitely recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Prigge

customer_reviews.title: Host brand is the best!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third type of Host Freezing Glasses. I have a set of four wine glasses, four whiskey glasses, and two margarita glasses. These are great for the patio, taking on picnics, taking for beach vacation, or just keeping your drink cold for hours on a hot summer day! Host makes a quality product. I keep my glasses in the freezer all of the time....ready to go. Have never had a problem with any style of glass that I own. If you share one.....you might never get it back. Everyone loves them.
customer_reviews.author: R. Jones

customer_reviews.title: My dad LOVES these glasses!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my dad for Father's Day, and he absolutely loves him. He has called me every night to tell me how well they work and how much he loves them. I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IS IN THE AIR
customer_reviews.text: GREAT GLASSES, AND CONTENTS! JUST A TINY PROBLEM.... THEY GET EMPTY TOO DARN FAST! AH........... MAKE THE CONTENTS IN A BIGGER CONTINER! ;-)
customer_reviews.author: JEPix

customer_reviews.title: Failed
customer_reviews.text: If you like salt on your margarita do not buy these, the salt will not stay on them. Didn’t really keep the drink cold either. Wish I hadn’t purchased them and we eventually threw them in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: CTCeliac

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for margaritas
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband and he absolutely loves them. It’s easy to just keep them in the freezer and bring them out once you want a drink. They truly keep your drink colder for longer. I would recommend these to everyone!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my mother for Christmas and she loves them! We used them a few weeks ago when I visited and I was impressed with how long they kept the margarita cold. I'm a slow sipper on drinks, so it's nice not having them warm to room temp so quickly. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Salt doesn’t stick like I thought it would
customer_reviews.text: These are really cool! My only gripe is that the salt doesn’t stick on them like they would if it was glass (these are made of plastic). OTHER THAN THAT, they keep the drink VERY chilly and they’re plastic, so it won’t shatter on the outdoor patio.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pass
customer_reviews.text: The concept is awesome but it melts ways too fast and all the condensation makes it slippery and unpleasant to hold the cup. I’m sorry but in my opinion, not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Howard

customer_reviews.title: Luv the shape material it’s made of good quality but way too small for the price
customer_reviews.text: Luv the shape material it’s made of good quality but way too small for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: talene harvel

customer_reviews.title: it's summer, hot & humid but...
customer_reviews.text: i'm only getting 1 drink per glass. Perhaps that's all most people have. I don't know. even keep my booze in fridge or freezer. They dopn't suck, but not quite what I was hoping for.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for margaritas in hot Florida
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our daughter and she loves them, they really keep the margarita cold!

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I love these products! I have the wine glasses and the margarita glasses. They keep your drink nice and cold without the need of ice watering it down. It doesnt even take that long to freeze or refrigerate them.

customer_reviews.title: Cold and frosty
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a Christmas gift. The couple I bought them for loved them so much they asked for another set for their wedding gift. These glasses keep the beverage cold for a long time. Great by the pool

customer_reviews.text: I use them as cat watering bowls and because of the wide mouth and short stem, they work perfectly as cat bowls

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it

customer_reviews.title: Keeps drink cold
customer_reviews.text: Really keeps my daiquiri cold! Keep it upside down in the freezer for best results and it must be hand-washed. So far, I'm really enjoying these for those frosty drinks in the hot summer.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome. Clean up easily and keeps your drink super cold. Would totally buy again

customer_reviews.text: Super cute cups. I like both colors ordered .. can’t wait to give as gifts for summer!

customer_reviews.title: Great margarita glasses for casual gatherings
customer_reviews.text: Giftable. Wish they were a little taller so ice could be included.

customer_reviews.title: Summer must-have
customer_reviews.text: These are a must have in warm weather. Small enough to fit nicely in the freezer and they really do keep tour drinks cold.

customer_reviews.title: Great for gift giving
customer_reviews.text: Have as gift. Came in a nice sturdy box. Glasses were thicker than I thought; I’m glad.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Got Them for my brother in law for Christmas. He dug em’!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan W.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control on the Glass version
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these, the glass version was the only one in stock so I went for it, I like the idea of glass better than the plastic ones anyway. The bases on this version are designed differently than the plastic ones..which would be fine except that mine arrived with one of the silicone bases malformed and thus, the glass won't sit level and is wobbly. I tried to press it back into the base thinking that maybe it had just slipped off a little but nope, it's all the way on. It's just defective. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but not practical
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are beautiful, but not practical. We live in Florida, so higher temperatures outside are accepted. When frozen, these glasses just create so much condensation as the cold meets the outside temperature, the water/moisture dripping is just a mess. Additionally, the small rubber bottom that is intended to make the glasses easier to hold onto, is just too small. You can only use a couple fingers to grasp the glass. And the bottom of the glasses being so small in relation to the tops, they are not east to sit down on the table. They are top heavy. I hate giving a less than positive review, but I would not purchase again based on these problems.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: Chilled margaritas
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I wish they had a little more of a base for holding, but otherwise, it does keep margaritas chilly and looks pretty cool coming out of the freezer. I keep them permanently chilled in freezer and haven’t had any issues. The only thing that needs improvement is the price, I’d like to get another set so I can have four.
customer_reviews.author: Lo

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: One of the two cups cracked and broke after one use on its own... really cheap quality. Would never buy this again. One of the two cups (the one that didn’t break) the rubber portion at the stem wasn’t sealed and loose. I can’t tell if they sent me a used item by mistake??
customer_reviews.author: S1

customer_reviews.title: Cute glasses
customer_reviews.text: I like to make margaritas in the summer and nothing is worse then your ice melting your tequila away!! These hold up ok in the heat. They freeze nicely but seems to defrost pretty quick which leaves you with a wet glass for round 2. Drink it fast and it will be pretty cold.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: The only way to drink a Margarita at home..Love these!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect way to drink a Margarita!! These stay cold for a long while. They are a great size, sturdy and stylish. Just pop in the freezer for a bit and they are ready to use. I keep mine in there so they are always ready. I will be purchasing another set.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Great for Frozen Cocktails
customer_reviews.text: Such a great glass for frozen magarirta's! Have been searching for glasses that condensation wouldn't drip on ones self and tables. Finally a perfect solution! I did suggest to company to make the band a little larger or lift it up for a better grip.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene B.

customer_reviews.title: Good for this hot summer with WFH
customer_reviews.text: My home is very hot now. and I don't want to use air conditioner. This item keeps cool temperature so long time. I always use this cup when I have water or something to drink.

customer_reviews.title: Great insulating cups for frozen drinks
customer_reviews.text: I love these cups! As a budding Bartender, I've been having a great time creating margaritas for my future menu! I got these for the chill factor since I'm tired of frozen drinks melting so fast.

customer_reviews.title: Everything I expected!
customer_reviews.text: These glasses are AWESOME! The glass was still frozen when I finished my margarita. Never had a glass actually stay frozen... much less pay empty!

customer_reviews.title: Cold margaritas !
customer_reviews.text: These frozen margarita glasses are wonderful ! Put them in the freezer til frozen. They keep my margaritas nice & cold !!

customer_reviews.text: I love these Margarita Freezable glasses. They work nicely for other cocktails, too. Look so special. Love them!

customer_reviews.title: Nice cups.
customer_reviews.text: Nice cups but I still had to add ice cubes to my room-temp margarita ingredients. I like the low-profile design.

customer_reviews.title: Too small, too shallow
customer_reviews.text: I like the concept of the freeze cups to keep a drink cold, but these are very, very small and don't hold much liquid. Plus they are very shallow - the drinks spill easily. Sadly, I had to return. I do not recommend

customer_reviews.title: Great glasses
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my wife (from our daughter) and it's perfect for a margarita drinker. The glasses are always cold when left in the freezer and fun to use and share with friends.

customer_reviews.text: These cups are great. They keep the cold for a good time after being removed from the freezer.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: They are a little clumsy, should have more of a stem. For the effort of keeping them in the freezer they really don't make that big of a difference to warrant the cost. Disappointed.

product_meta.title: HOST Freeze Stemless Margarita, Plastic Glass Insulated Gel Chiller, Double Wall Frozen Cocktail, Set of 2 Cups, 12 oz, Grey
product_meta.description: Color:GrayWith the FREEZE Margarita glass you get all the benefits of your favorite iconic shaped glass, with a patio friendly update. Made from BPA-free reusable plastic, it is less fragile than a glass so you can drink carefree. After just 2 hours in the freezer, the cup's built-in proprietary cooling gel will do the rest and keep your drink chilled for hours.
feature_bullets: KEEP YOUR FROZEN MARGARITAS FROSTY! - The Host Margarita Freeze cocktail glasses are engineered specifically for frozen cocktails and mixed drinks. Don’t be left with a puddle of margarita mix, keep your slushies and more nice and crisp. These keep your margaritas and other cocktails colder for way longer than just a chilled down glass.

THE MAGIC IS IN THE GEL - The insulated plastic walls of these margarita cocktail glasses are filled with proprietary cooling gel. This works as a beverage chiller when frozen. Pop them in the freezer for at least two hours to freeze the gel down and keep your drinks between forty-three and fifty-three degrees Fahrenheit. Keep frozen drinks frozen, longer!

COMFORT-GRIP SILICONE BAND FOR EASY SIPPING - The BPA-free plastic construction creates a sturdy margarita cocktail glass that is perfectly suited for outdoor use. An insulated silicone band on the base makes for comfortable handling and ensures that this plastic cocktail glass set will be your favorite new drink accessories.

THE PERFECT GLASS FOR A WIDE RANGE OF FROZEN COCKTAILS - All kinds of classic cocktail recipes stay frosty in the Host Margarita Freeze. Use as frozen daiquiri glasses, frozen pina colada glasses, boozy slushie glasses, New Orleans street cocktail recipes drinks, and more. Use with smoothies or ice cream and other frozen treats, too!

INNOVATIVE GIFT FOR THE MARGARITA LOVER WHO HAS EVERYTHING - This margarita glass set is great for any fun-loving cocktail enthusiast as Cinco de Mayo party supplies, gift for mom on mother’s day, outdoor cocktail set, and more. Great for anyone who loves fun and drinks in the sun. Kitchen gadget lovers will appreciate this innovative, unique drinkware set.
